data.taskTitle: Build Cloudflare Pages adapter as reference plugin
Build Cloudflare Pages adapter as reference plugin
data.approach: Build cloudflare-pages plugin in ~/.config/squad/ingest-plugins/cloudflare-pages/ with index.js following the RSS adapter pattern. Implements poll() to fetch deployments via Cloudflare API, test() for connectivity, validate() for config checks. Default filter on failure status. Fetches build logs for failed deploys as attachments.

data.taskTitle: Build Cloudflare Pages adapter as reference plugin
summary: Created cloudflare-pages plugin in ~/.config/squad/ingest-plugins/cloudflare-pages/
Implements poll(), test(), validate() - all tested with mock data
Default filter only creates tasks for failed deployments
Fetches and attaches build logs for failures
Plugin discovery, schema validation, and filter engine integration all verified
reviewFocus: Plugin structure follows RSS adapter pattern

data.approach: The Cloudflare Pages adapter already exists and loads via pluginLoader. Need to verify remaining acceptance criteria: add cloudflare-pages to verify endpoint for connection testing, ensure end-to-end flow works. Testing filter engine, dedup, and task creation integration.

data.taskTitle: Build Cloudflare Pages adapter as reference plugin

data.taskTitle: Build Cloudflare Pages adapter as reference plugin
summary: Fixed setup guide not appearing in IngestWizard for Cloudflare Pages
Root cause: guide was added to dead pluginFieldInput snippet instead of DynamicConfigForm component
Added setupGuide rendering to DynamicConfigForm.svelte (open by default)
Build succeeds

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Cloudflare Pages Adapter Plugin
suggestedTasks.description:
Create comprehensive unit tests for the Cloudflare Pages adapter to validate all plugin methods. Tests should cover:
- validate() method configuration validation
- test() method API connection checks
- poll() method deployment parsing and filtering
- Error handling scenarios for API failures
Tests will be located in a new test/ directory within the plugin folder.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure plugin reliability and serve as reference for future plugin testing

suggestedTasks.title: Create Example Configuration Documentation for Cloudflare Plugin
suggestedTasks.description:
Expand README.md to include detailed setup instructions, configuration examples, and troubleshooting tips. Documentation should cover:
- How to obtain Cloudflare API token
- Required permission scopes
- Example configuration JSON
- Common error scenarios and resolutions
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve usability and onboarding for plugin users

patterns: Plugin metadata structure with configFields and itemFields
gotchas: Ensure secure handling of API tokens
Implement robust pagination and state management
Handle various deployment states and triggers

documentationNeeds: API token creation and permission guidelines
